Welcome to Pureport Python SDK's documentation!
===============================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

The Pureport Fabric SDK project maintains a Python library that can be used to
consume the Pureport Fabric API.  Pureport provides a cloud native network
service that allows organizations to connect public and private cloud
infrastructures together.  This library allows organizations to easily build
and maintain cloud native networks using the Pureport service.

In order to use this Python SDK, you must have an account with Pureport.  If
you don't already have an account, you can sign up for one for free at
https://console.pureport.com.

.. _Contents:

   :maxdepth: 1

   session
   bindings
   defaults
   changelog
